At that time the World Honored One spoke a verse, saying:

The characteristic of no images means that it arises due to the habitual tendencies of the characteristics of all vehicles and non-Buddhist paths;
The characteristic of being upheld by the vows of all buddhas means that it arises due to the empowerment of the buddhas' own original vows;

At that time, the Bodhisattva MahÄsattva Great Wisdom, knowing the thoughts in the minds of the bodhisattvas, and receiving the majestic spiritual power of all the buddhas, addressed the Buddha, saying:
